goals: Identify and develop healthy coping mechanisms for stress

Client will develop a list of 3-5 triggers and appropriate responses
tasks: Attend weekly check-ins with case manager
Complete substance abuse self-assessment
Identify 3 healthy alternatives to substance use
Attend one educational session on substance abuse

goals: Reduce frequency and amount of substance use

Establish a support network for maintaining sobriety
objectives: Client will attend weekly substance abuse counseling
Client will identify personal triggers and develop avoidance strategies

tasks: Attend twice-weekly individual counseling sessions
Complete substance abuse assessment with treatment provider
Attend one NA/AA meeting per week
Practice identified coping skills daily and maintain a journal

Attend intensive outpatient program (IOP) 3x weekly
Attend NA/AA meetings at least 3x weekly
Submit to random drug/alcohol testing as required
Meet with case manager weekly to monitor progress
Complete relapse prevention workbook
Identify and engage with a sponsor
Develop written aftercare plan with treatment team

objectives: Client will identify personal stressors and coping strategies
